IEEE Recommended Practice for Routine Impulse Tests for Distribution Transformers
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.138-2016 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.138-1998)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: General test procedures for performing routine quality control tests that are suitable for high-volume, production line testing are included in this recommended practice. Transformer connections, test methods, circuit configurations, and failure detection methods are addressed. This recommended practice covers liquid-immersed, single- and three-phase distribution transformers.
